heroSection.heading: Helps for your ideal body fitness
heroSection.description: Motivate users with benefits and positive reinforcement, and offer modifications and progress tracking.

generalGym.name: General Gym
generalGym.description: A place where people go to exercise with various equipment for strength training and cardiovascular fitness.

yoga.name: Yoga
yoga.description: A practice that combines physical postures, breathing exercises, and meditation to enhance flexibility and mental clarity.

boxing.name: Boxing
boxing.description: A combat sport where participants throw punches at each other, often involving rigorous training and conditioning.

cycling.name: Cycling
cycling.description: Exercise involving riding a bicycle, either on a stationary bike or outdoors, focusing on cardiovascular endurance.

swimming.name: Swimming
swimming.description: A full-body workout that involves moving through water using the arms and legs, enhancing both strength and cardiovascular health.

running.name: Running
running.description: A cardiovascular exercise that involves moving at a fast pace on foot, promoting overall fitness and endurance.

dance.name: Dance
dance.description: A rhythmic activity that combines movement and music, offering a fun and engaging way to improve fitness and coordination.

martialArts.name: Martial Arts
martialArts.description: Various systems of combat training focusing on self-defense, discipline, and physical fitness through techniques and forms.

pilates.name: Pilates
pilates.description: A form of exercise that emphasizes balance, posture, strength, and flexibility through controlled movements and breathing.

weightlifting.name: Weightlifting
weightlifting.description: Strength training involving lifting heavy weights to build muscle mass and overall strength.

ctaWithImage.heading: Transform your physique with our fitness plan.

nutritionExperience.heading: Enhance user experience with healthy nutrition tips, support resources, and social elements

testimonial.heading: What Our Member Say About Us?

jonathanEdward.message: Join this fitness member, the best choice that I’ve. They’re very professional and give you suggestions about what food and nutrition that you can eat.

sarahConnor.message: This service is amazing, I achieved great results in no time!

michaelJohnson.message: I highly recommend their services. They truly care about your success!

newsletter.benefits: Clearly communicate the benefits of subscribing, such as exclusive content and breaking news.

gymCenter.title: Gym Center
gymCenter.description: Highlight benefits of each exercise, both physical and mental

error404.title: Oops! Page not found
error404.message: It looks like you got lost on the way. Let's get back to training and refocus!
